title: The Next Big Influencer Is a Toad

data.content: Watch out world, Toby Toad’s here

From the intricately created miniature scenes to this toad’s playful smize, the Instagram account of Toby Toad is sure to bring delight into your day. In addition to his successful Instagram page, this multi-talented toad has a TikTok featuring videos of him having a barbecue, working from home, and doing a puzzle.
Toby’s human assistant Savannah Mikell shared some of Toby’s favorite photos with Tenderly so that you can get to know this sweet and special toad.
From salad to iced tea, Toby has quite a refined palette.
He even shares some more intimate moments with his fans…
Toby also has quite a green thumb, making his own “jams n’ such” and tending to his flower boxes.
Check out what Toby is up to today over at @yaboi_toby_toad!
